definition: Futurism (artistic and social movement of the 20th century)

sentences.english: My Futurist experiment in cooking has worked.
sentences.chinese: 我在烹饪方面的未来主义实验凑效了。

sentences.english: Futurism , an early twentieth-century movement in art, rejected all traditions and at.
sentences.chinese: 未来主义，二十世纪早期的一个艺术思潮。

sentences.english: New-age futuristic “Line” sunglasses design from MACKDADDY.
sentences.chinese: 来自MACKDADDY的新式未来主义太阳镜。

sentences.english: Futurism, an early twentieth-century movement in art.
sentences.chinese: 未来主义，二十世纪早期的一个艺术思潮。

sentences.english: Futurism was an influential artistic movement in the early part of the century.
sentences.chinese: 未来主义是本世纪早期有影响的艺术运动。

sentences.english: "Futurism" will be a trend, such as the wave shoes production.
sentences.chinese: “未来主义”将是一大流行趋势，诸如波鞋的产生。

definition: Futurism (artistic and social movement of the 20th century)
